full_summary:
## 2 Ton Truck with Service Body and Boom: Request for Proposal
### Tender Details
* **Reference Number**: WS4602098926-Doc4602537495
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4602098926
* **Publication Date**: June 26, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: August 23, 2024 @ 14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: July 24, 2024

### Contract Information
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: September 4, 2024
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)

### Contract Description
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) at F Division, located in Saskatchewan, requires the supply of one 2024, or latest year, Ford F550 Truck, with a mounted Bucket Articulated Telescopic Boom. The resulting contract will include the option to purchase one additional 2024, or latest year, indicated Truck, with a mounted Bucket Articulated Telescopic Boom within 12 months of contract award.

### Contact Information
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
	+ Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
* **End-User Entity**: Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)
	+ Address: 73 Leikin Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A OR2, Canada
* **Contact Person**: Stephanie Way, Department of Public Works and Government Services (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: [stephanie.way@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:stephanie.way@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Additional Information
*   The tender documents can be accessed through the Government of Canada’s tendering platform at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20133016?extsite=MjAxMzMwMTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20133016?extsite=MjAxMzM
